alert.note: Alert for St. Charles; St. John The Baptist (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 5:01PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central St. John The Baptist and northwestern St. Charles Parishes through 530 PM CDT... At 501 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Laplace, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph with the outflow from the thunderstorms over the lake. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Reserve, Laplace, Edgard, Killona, Montz and Garyville. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 198 and 213. Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 1 and 6. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: St. Charles; St. John The Baptist
